name: Status
func:
msg.payload =   {Z1Level:flow.get('Z1Level'), 
                Z2Level:flow.get('Z2Level'),
                Z1Light:flow.get('Z1Light'),
                Z2Light:flow.get('Z2Light'),
                Z1Blinds:flow.get('Z1Blinds'),
                Z2Blinds:flow.get('Z2Blinds'),
                Sunshine:flow.get('Sunshine'),
                TotalEnergyCost:flow.get('TotalEnergyCost'),
                EnergyCost:flow.get('EnergyCost'),
                Hour:flow.get('Hour')
                };
return msg;
